ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 25 years from now
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Greg
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 29, 2005 5:00 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] 25 years from now


LOL the whole discussion of 25 years from now in EQ land got me
thinking lol. I hope if by some scary chance EQ is around in 25 years,
that it would be very cool..more than it is now.

I see us wearing the "VR Suit" instead of using a keyboard. With it
you would feel it when an orc knocked you on your arse...and all
movements would respond, like (if my understanding is correct) they do
with digital animation for movies and such. You make a sword slashing
move, and your toon does....etc.

Hell, if they'd add that now, lol I'd be there. I magine the workout
one would get after playing EQ...lol

Just a moronic thought...Greg


--------------------

Sounds way to energetic for me!!
